mapper.sql: spo.packing_order_id, spo.packing_order_code, spo.despatch_batch, spo.order_time, spo.supplier_id, spo.shipment_enterprise_id, spo.total_carton_qty, spo.leave_factory_time, spo.leave_port_time, spo.arrival_port_time, spo.arrival_time, spo.order_status, spo.audit_status, spo.`status`, spo.remark, spo.org_id, spo.create_user_id, spo.create_time, spo.modified_user_id, spo.modified_time, spo.option1, spo.option2, spo.option3, spo.ago_confirm_user_id
mapper.select: select warehouse_id FROM base_warehouse where org_id=#{orgId}
select storage_id FROM base_storage where storage_type=2 and org_id=#{orgId} and warehouse_id=#{warehouseId}
select storage_id FROM base_storage where storage_type=1 and org_id=#{orgId} and warehouse_id=#{warehouseId}
select inventory_status_id FROM base_inventory_status where org_id=#{orgId} and warehouse_id=#{warehouseId}
select material_owner_id FROM base_material_owner where org_id=#{orgId}

select material_purpose FROM eng_contract_qty_order where contract_code=#{contractCode} and device_code=#{deviceCode} and dominant_term_code=#{dominantTermCode} and location_num=#{locationNum} and material_code=#{materialCode}
